statements: SELECT * FROM event_registration WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name FROM event_registration WHERE attendee_email = 'example@mail.com';
SELECT event_name, attendee_email FROM event_registration WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM event_registration WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM event_registration WHERE attendee_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM event_registration WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name FROM event_registration WHERE attendee_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM event_registration GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_attendees > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT attendee_email FROM event_registration ORDER BY attendee_email DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_registration WHERE attendee_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') AND event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT attendee_name FROM Attendees WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT attendee_name FROM Attendees ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name FROM Events WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, event_name FROM Attendees INNER JOIN Events ON Attendees.event_id = Events.event_id;
SELECT event_id, COUNT(attendee_id) AS num_attendees FROM Attendees GROUP BY event_id HAVING num_attendees > 10;
SELECT * FROM Event;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM Event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM Attendee WHERE attendee_id = 100;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, rsvp_status FROM Event JOIN RSVP ON Event.event_id = RSVP.event_id;
SELECT * FROM RSVP WHERE rsvp_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM Event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event WHERE event_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM Attendee WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, rsvp_status FROM Event e JOIN RSVP r ON e.event_id = r.event_id JOIN Attendee a ON r.attendee_id = a.attendee_id WHERE r.rsvp_status = 'Attending';
SELECT e.event_name, a.attendee_name FROM Event e, Attendee a, RSVP r WHERE e.event_id = r.event_id AND a.attendee_id = r.attendee_id AND e.event_date > '2021-08-01' ORDER BY e.event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name FROM Event JOIN Registration ON Event.event_id = Registration.event_id JOIN Attendee ON Registration.attendee_id = Attendee.attendee_id;

SELECT event_name, attendee_name, registration_date FROM Event JOIN Registration ON Event.event_id = Registration.event_id JOIN Attendee ON Registration.attendee_id = Attendee.attendee_id WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM Event;
SELECT * FROM Event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT a.attendee_name, e.event_name, r.response FROM Attendee a INNER JOIN RSVP r ON a.attendee_id = r.attendee_id INNER JOIN Event e ON r.event_id = e.event_id;
SELECT e.event_name, COUNT(r.attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM Event e LEFT JOIN RSVP r ON e.event_id = r.event_id GROUP BY e.event_name;
SELECT e.event_name, a.attendee_name, r.response FROM Event e INNER JOIN RSVP r ON e.event_id = r.event_id INNER JOIN Attendee a ON r.attendee_id = a.attendee_id ORDER BY e.event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE phone IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events JOIN attendees ON events.event_id = attendees.event_id WHERE attendee_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_name;
SELECT attendees.attendee_name, events.event_name FROM attendees INNER JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.event_id WHERE attendees.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM events JOIN registrations ON events.event_id = registrations.event_id GROUP BY event_name ORDER BY total_registrations DESC;

SELECT attendee_name, payment_date, amount FROM attendees JOIN registrations ON attendees.attendee_id = registrations.attendee_id JOIN payments ON registrations.registration_id = payments.registration_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
